text:
Twenty20 - Los Angeles, CA (Marina del Rey)

Twenty20 connects mobile photographers with buyers for their imagery. We’re disrupting the stock photography market by bringing an entirely new type of product to creatives - imagery of real life created by real people. Two years in, we’ve built an image catalog bigger than those of industry leaders like Shutterstock and iStockphoto.

Mobile UI/UX Designer: http://twenty20.theresumator.com/apply/Xdz6YE/Mobile-UIUX-De...

DevOps Engineer: http://twenty20.theresumator.com/apply/HUKIso/Sr-DevOpsTools...

Director of Content Operations: http://twenty20.theresumator.com/apply/8tU58K/Director-Of-Co...

Sr. Search Engineer: http://twenty20.theresumator.com/apply/P7dbhf/Senior-Search-...

Come join our awesome team!
